extensionDescription.message: TYPO3 Review simplifies reviewing of TYPO3 patches.

optionsMode.description: Show header information in [render mode] in the [screen position]

optionsCornerFor.description: Show header information in the [screen position] ___corner for___ [seconds] seconds.

optionsSeconds.description: Show header information in the [screen position] corner for [seconds] ___seconds___.

optionsSectionContentAboutHTTPSpy.description: Section of text describing TYPO3 Review
optionsSectionContentAboutHTTPSpy.message: TYPO3 Review enables you to inspect the request and response headers right after page load with no extra clicks. The headers appear in a box on top of the loaded content and disappear after a configurable number of seconds. The normal mode displays all requests, responses and cookies while the micro mode displays only a few configured response headers.

optionsSectionContentAboutMe.message: My name is Michiel Roos. I had a lot of fun developing TYPO3 Review. I also learnt a lot. I hope you find it usefull and enjoy using it. If you have any suggetstions or constructive criticism, please contact me. If you enjoy this extension, pretty please consider donating a random amount to me.

optionsSectionTitleWhatDoesItDo.description: Section title of What does it do?

optionsLabelHideRequestHeaders.description: Label for hide request headers input field

optionsLabelHideResponseHeaders.description: Label for hide response headers input field

optionsLabelShowResponseHeaders.description: Label for show response headers (in micro mode) input field
optionsLabelShowResponseHeaders.message: Show only these response headers in micro mode

optionsLabelShowResults.description: Label for show results input field

popupDefaultMessage.description: The default message shown in the browserAction popup
popupDefaultMessage.message: No headers were captured yet. Please reload this tab to see the headers.
